It provides bonuses to maximum health, attack damage, and ability haste, helping to improve both survivability and damage output.

The "Lightshield Strike" effect causes your first attack against an enemy champion to critically strike, dealing 160% damage and restoring health based on your base attack damage and a percentage of your missing health.
